"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"During a Falling Stars event, gifts will drop from the sky.

Diamonds, iron nuggets, gold nuggets, endermites, end stone, and chorus fruit can be found falling from the sky."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.falling_stars.1"}]}]
